key_algorithm.description: The algorithm used to generate the key.

name.description: The name of the service account key. This must have format `projects/{PROJECT_ID}/serviceAccounts/{ACCOUNT}/keys/{KEYID}`, where `{ACCOUNT}` is the email address or unique id of the service account.

public_key_type.description: The output format of the public key requested. TYPE_X509_PEM_FILE is the default output format.

block.description: Get an ephemeral service account public key.
